mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dogboard ( b_category, b_title, b_content, b_id, b_price, b_inventory, b_from ) VALUES ( #{b_category}, #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{b_id}, #{b_price}, #{b_inventory}, #{b_from} )
mapper.select:
SELECT b_idx as b_idx, b_category as b_category, b_title as b_title, b_content as b_content, b_price as b_price, b_inventory as b_inventory
FROM dogboard
mapper.update: UPDATE dogboard SET b_title = #{b_title}, b_category = #{b_category}, b_content = #{b_content}, b_price = #{b_price}, b_inventory = #{b_inventory}, b_from = #{b_from}, b_id = #{b_id} WHERE b_idx = #{b_idx}
